author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Needs a `[compat]` section in `Project.toml` with at least an entry for `julia` itself, e.g.:
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
would mean that the package is compatible with Julia versions `[1.0.0, 2.0.0)`.

I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
A tag already exists, but it points at the wrong commit
```
To retry, comment on this PR with the phrase `TagBot tag`.
cc: @christopher-dG
<!-- 4f3e37e0-c013-11e9-8f46-eb8f6fcdd593 -->
